QuestData.Title: Ishanah
QuestData.Description: Now that you've decided to side with the Aldor, you'd do well to introduce yourself to their leader. You will find High Priestess Ishanah inside the Shrine of Unending Light.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ishanah inside the Shrine of Unending Light at the Aldor Rise in Shattrath City.$B$BPerforming quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, $N. I'm glad to hear you've decided to join us in our mission. May the Light always protect you.
